title: sath gurupriyaa
sahitya:
sat gurupriya tyAgabrahmamE!

sat gati sAdanam undan isaik karuvUlamE  

anupallavi

sarkkaraip pandalil tEn mAri enappozhiyum

kaRka eLiya naDai isaiyuruvil vAzhum  

caraNam  

mAdhavanin mahimai anudinam OdiDum

mAtava shIlarin madiyil niRaindiDum

gItamE! sangItamE! santatamcindai kavarnda gItamE!

vEdangaLin mUla poruLena uNartiya
